siteMetadata.title: Artem Demo, indie developer
siteMetadata.description: Blog about web development, indie GameDev

node.excerpt: I started experimenting with game development. For now, it’s a hobby, we’ll see how it will go :)

I decided to add diversity in everyday developers’ life and last month I started to learn a new thing - pixel art.
It was long waiting goal, but finally I found time to invest in it (thanks you to all lockdowns, I guess).

frontmatter.title: I started to learn pixel art
